titles.title: Providing for consideration of the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 1) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to titles II and V of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2018.
Providing for consideration of the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 1) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to titles II and V of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2018.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 115-476, by Mr. Sessions.
Rule provides for consideration of Senate Amendment to H.R. 1. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 112.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 668.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 234 - 188 (Roll no. 697).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 232 - 190 (Roll no. 698).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 1) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to titles II and V of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2018.
